dynamic_line: I was an archaeologist. Plumbing ruins for lost treasure, or excavation sites, I had some great times.

I found a lot of treasure in my time. Though, on my last trip, we unearthed something... strange. Hundreds of horrid creatures poured forth, and killed a lot of people. I was one of the few who made it out. Our sponsors got wind of this, and dumped the bottom out on our work.

However, I made it out with a map of the site, and where it is. If you want, I would like to go back; get vengance for all my friends those <name_b> killed. I want you to help me, that was years ago, there should be less now.
I was an archaeologist. Plumbing ruins for lost treasure, or excavation sites, I had some great times.
Well, on my last trip, I fell into a gulley; busted my knee to shreds. It healed, though I couldn't comb ruins anymore, like I used to. So, I settled down, got a home, and lived that way since.
